title: Plat for 2 years and now I cant win in silver
body:
Mid main, used to play vel koz, viktor, xerath, brand, etc

Completely out of ideas, i have like a 7W-26L ratio.

Update:

Am now 9W-30L. About to be demoted to silver 5. 

Update:

9W-31L. 21-12-27 KDA w/ 88,000 damage done, still lost. 

Update:

Demoted to silver 5

replies.body: you just started kid whats the big deal. currently a lot of silvers and golds are platinums anyway. and there is a decent amount of duo Qs at the beginning of every season. wait 3-4 weeks and try again.

If what was working for you before isn't now and your dead set to play this season.

Then its time to try something different until something sticks and works for you.
Just wait a year or so for riot to fix the hilarious disaster that is matchmaking.

Lol, you realize Plat and Gold players are still in Silver right now right? So climbing in Silver is like climbing in Plat-Gold rn. Just wait for everyone to climb out and have the silvers reach back to where they are. Even some diamonds might be in Silver atm.
